author: gdaniels
msg: Change createElement() to createElementNS(""...) when generating
deployment info.  This fixes problems where getLocalName() was
Also add a flag to the AxisEngine indicating whether or not to save
configuration when read/modified.  This defaults to false for the client,
true for the server, which should result in no more client-config.xmls
being dropped willy-nilly on your hard drive.

author: tomj
msg: Remove extra \r chars at end of lines.

author: gdaniels
msg: Enable URL mapping for "services/*" for SimpleAxisServer
